item.title: Why I Failed to Use Calabash for Mobile Testing
item.description: “When I give up, I write it down. Someday I will pick myself up from the fall.” Preface I admit that I failed to use Calabash for mobile testing. It was a big failure but it was beautiful, I call it reckless passion. Although I learned a lot from it, I’ve never shared what I learned in public. After that, I changed my focus and gave up on traditional UI automation.
